title: Key Decisions
description: Keyshawn Johnson sits down with Cari to share why he decided to remove his son Keyshawn Jr. from the Nebraska football program and how players can better prepare for life after football. Plus, Cari introduces a new segment.
itunes:title: Key Decisions
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
